response_text: Hello! How can I help you today?
Thank you for chatting with us. Have a great day!

Your order #{orderNumber} is currently #{status}. You can track it using your tracking number: #{trackingNumber}
Payment successful! Your order #{orderNumber} has been paid for and confirmed.

Your order #{orderNumber} has been shipped and is on its way. Expected delivery: #{deliveryDate}
I can help you with a return request. Please provide your order number #{orderNumber} and reason for return.
Our support team is available Monday-Friday 9AM-6PM. You can reach us at support@company.com or call 1-800-HELP.
I'm sorry, I didn't understand that. Could you please try rephrasing your question?

I'd be happy to help you with product information. What specific product are you interested in?
Our pricing varies by product and quantity. Could you tell me which product you're interested in?
We're open Monday-Friday 9AM-6PM, Saturday 10AM-4PM, and closed on Sundays.
I can help you book an appointment. What date and time would work best for you?
Our cancellation policy allows cancellations up to 24 hours before your scheduled appointment.
Refunds are processed within 5-7 business days after we receive your returned item.
Our products come with a 1-year manufacturer warranty. Extended warranties are available.
